Articles.Content:
Hello people ! Happy to join the Kerbals! haha ;D

So I haven\'t yet purchased the game but I am planning to do really soon when I receive my pay check.

So I live in Holland and here we use iDeal, probably 90% uses it.

So I\'m wondering: You only support Paypal as of now but will you add iDeal ? There are a lot of friends in my class who played the demo and well it has become a big phenomenon everyone want to buy the game and they are trying everything to find a guy who has Paypal!

Secondly will the game get more planets then the Mun? It would be SO sick to make your own rocket and like get it to Jupiter or even the asteroid belt to mine stuff !

Will KSP also get a mode that allows you to make stuff that will be in space already? Without having to launch a rocket?

Lastly! Will the graphics eventually be enhanced more? & ability to construct massive space stations?!!!! Ghehe as you can see I\'m really fallen in love with this game already and I only play the demo still

Greetings & Big thank you to the Squad Team!

I think you can buy trough paypal straight from your bank account, i dont know much about that.

I believe planets will be added check this http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Planned_features

Most of the features that you ask about are actually in the full version. There is another Moon and better graphics, as for the construction in space; there are mods that allow things like this to be done.
